    • Add API

    Description

    Title Description
    URL company/{item_id}
    Method post
    Use
    Notice

    Url Parameters

    Parameter Type Description
    item_id integer Item id

    Input Parameters

    Input Parameters

    {
    "api_key": "e4cbcdc2faff41a7e311",
    "categories": [1, 2, 3],
    "specs": [{
        "id": 1,
        "image": {
            "name": "xxx.jpg",
            "cover": true
        }
    }]
}
    Parameter Type Description
    api_key string The identity token of user
    categories array Collection of category id
    specs array Collection of spec
    spec Type Description
    id integer Spec id
    image object Cover image of spec
    spec.image Type Description
    name string Filename
    cover boolean Is cover image or not

    Return Parameters

    Success

    Nothing was returned

    Return Success Parameters

    Success 
    {
    "api_key": "e4cbcdc2faff41a7e311"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    api_key string The identity token of user

    Return Failure Parameters

    Failure 
    {
    "error_name": "illegal_form_input",
    "validation": {
        "name": ["invalid"],
        "number": ["required"]
    }
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • not_sign_in: the api_key is invalid
    • not_select_company: the user has not select current company
    • illegal_form_input: The form format does not pass validation
    validation object (option) If the error_name is ‘illegal_form_input’, system will show reasons for each error input
    validation Type Description
    name array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    2. The data should not be empty
    invalid:
    1. The data not string
    number array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    2. The data should not be empty

    System Currency List

    Description

    Title Description
    URL system/currency/list
    Method post
    Use To get all currencies in the system
    Notice

    Input Parameters

    Input Parameters

    {
    "api_key": "e4cbcdc2faff41a7e311"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    api_key string The identity token of user

    Return Success Parameters

    Return Parameters

    Success 
    {
    "currencies":[{
        "id": 1,
        "name": "CHF"
    }, {
        "id": 2,
        "name": "EUR"
    }]
}
    Parameter Type Description
    currencies array Collection of currency. Order by name from A-Z
    currency Type Description
    id integer The currency id
    name string The currency name

    Return Failure Parameters

    Failure 
    {
    "error_name":"lack of parameters"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • lack of parameters: required parameters miss in the request
    • does not signin: the user does not signin

    Upload Image

    Description

    Title Description
    URL user/upload/image
    Method post
    Use To upload image
    Notice

    Input Parameters

    Input Parameters

    {
    "api_key": "e4cbcdc2faff41a7e311",
    "image":"data:image/jpeg;base64,/9j/4AAQSkZJRgABAQAAAQAAAk..."
}
    Parameter Type Description
    api_key string The identity token of user
    image string The base64 encode image and Mime type. Image format require as jpg, jpeg, png, gif

    Return Success Parameters

    Return Parameters

    Success 
    {
    "file_name":"asdasdasds.jpg"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    file_name string The temporary filename

    Return Failure Parameters

    Failure 
    {
    "error_name":"lack of parameters"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • lack of parameters: required parameters miss in the request
    • does not signin: the user does not signin
    • not image: the type of MIME type is not image
    • invalid image format: the subtype of MIME type is not jpg, jpeg, png and gif

    User

    Sign in

    Description

    Title Description
    URL user/signin
    Method post
    Use Let user sign in and get it api key
    Notice

    Input Parameters

    Input Parameters

    {
    "email": "tester@prophetdigit.com",
    "password": "12345678"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    email string The user’s account
    password string The user’s password

    Return Success Parameters

    Return Parameters

    Success 
    {
    "api_key": "e4cbcdc2faff41a7e311",
    "user_id": 1
}
    Parameter Type Description
    api_key string The identity token of user
    user_id integer The user id

    Return Failure Parameters

    Failure 
    {
    "error_name":"lack of parameters"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • lack of parameters: required parameters miss in the request
    • does not match: the account has not exist or the password not match the account

    Sign up with Email only

    Description

    Title Description
    URL user/signupwithemailonly
    Method post
    Use Let user sign up with email only
    Notice

    Input Parameters

    Input Parameters

    {
    "email": "tester@prophetdigits.com"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    email string The user’s email

    Return Success Parameters

    Return Parameters

    Success 
    {
  "api_key": "e4cbcdc2faff41a7e311"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    api_key string The identity token of user

    Return Failure Parameters

    Failure 
    {
    "error_name": "illegal form input",
    "validation": {
        "email": ["required"]
    }
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • lack of parameters: required parameters miss in the request
    • illegal form input: the input does not pass validation
    validation object (option) If the error_name is ‘illegal form input’, system will show reasons for each error input
    validation Type Description
    email array (option) required:
    1. The email cannot be empty or null
    invalid email:
    1. The data need accord with email format
    duplicate:
    1. The email has already been used

    Sign up

    Description

    Title Description
    URL user/signup
    Method post
    Use Let user sign up an account
    Notice

    Input Parameters

    Input Parameters

    {
    "given_name": "Tester",
    "family_name": "Prophetdigit",
    "title": 1,
    "email": "tester@prophetdigits.com",
    "password": "12345678"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    given_name string The user’s given name
    family_name string The user’s family name
    title integer The user’s gender
    • 0: Mr.
    • 1: Mrs.
    email string The user’s email
    password string The user’s password

    Return Parameters

    Success

    Nothing was returned

    Return Failure Parameters

    Failure 
    {
    "error_name": "illegal form input",
    "validation": {
        "given_name": ["required"],
        "password": ["word count"]
    }
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • lack of parameters: required parameters miss in the request
    • illegal form input: the input does not pass validation
    validation object (option) If the error_name is 'illegal form input’, system will show reasons for each error input
    validation Type Description
    given_name array (option) required:
    1. The given_name cannot be empty or null
    family_name array (option) required:
    1. The family_name cannot be empty or null
    title array (option) required:
    1. The title cannot be empty or null
    invalid title:
    1. The title only can be 0 or 1
    email array (option) required:
    1. The email cannot be empty or null
    invalid email:
    1. The data need accord with email format
    duplicate:
    1. The email has already been used
    password array (option) required:
    1. The password cannot be empty or null
    word count:
    1. The password need more than 7 words and less than 21 words

    Search Users

    Description

    Title Description
    URL user/search
    Method post
    Use To search user
    Notice Searching user should input full email

    Input Parameters

    Input Parameters

    {
    "api_key": "e4cbcdc2faff41a7e311",
    "search_text":"tester@prophetdigits.com"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    api_key string The identity token of user
    search_text string The user’s email

    Return Success Parameters

    Return Parameters

    Success 
    {
    "users": [{
        "id": 1,
        "email": "tester@prophetdigits.com",
        "given_name": "Tester",
        "family_name": "Prophet"
    }]
}
    Parameter Type Description
    users array Collection of user
    user Type Description
    id integer The user’s id
    email string The user’s email
    given_name string The user’s given name
    family_name string The user’s family name

    Return Failure Parameters

    Failure 
    {
    "error_name":"lack of parameters"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • lack of parameters: required parameters miss in the request
    • does not signin: the user does not signin
    • empty text: the search text cannot be empty

    Reset Password

    Description

    Title Description
    URL user/password/cover
    Method post
    Use To reset user’s password
    Notice

    Input Parameters

    Input Parameters

    {
    "email": "tester@prophetdigits.com",
    "password": "123456",
    "validation_code": "123456"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    email string The user’s account
    password string The user’s new password
    validation_code string The validation code which takes from email

    Return Parameters

    Success

    Nothing was returned

    Return Failure Parameters

    Failure 
    {
    "error_name": "illegal form input",
    "validation": {
        "password": ["required"]
    }
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • email not exist: the email is not signed up yet
    • validation code not match: the validation_code is invalid
    • timeout: the validation code has been expired
    • illegal form input: the input does not pass validation
    validation object (option) If the error_name is 'illegal form input’, system will show reasons for each error input
    validation Type Description
    password array (option) required:
    1. The password cannot be empty or null
    word count:
    1. The password need more than 7 words and less than 21 words
    validation_code array (option) required:
    1. The validation_code cannot be empty or null

    Company

    Search Companies

    Description

    Title Description
    URL user/company/search
    Method post
    Use To get companies by name
    Notice It’s prefix search and return 10 companies most similar

    Input Parameters

    Input Parameters

    {
    "api_key": "e4cbcdc2faff41a7e311",
    "search_text": "Test"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    api_key string The identity token of user
    search_text string The company name

    Return Success Parameters

    Return Parameters

    Success 
    [{
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Test Shop",
    "cover_image": {
        "name": "xxx",
        "cover": true,
        "resource": {
            "240p": "http://abc/xxx_240p.jpg",
            "480p": "http://abc/xxx_480p.jpg",
            "720p": "http://abc/xxx_720p.jpg",
            "1080p": "http://abc/xxx_1080p.jpg"
        }
    },
    "owner": {
        "id": 1,
        "given_name": "Tester",
        "family_name": "Prophet",
        "email": "tester@prophetdigits.com"
    }
}, {
    "id": 2,
    "name": "Test Bike",
    "cover_image": {},
    "owner": {
        "id": 1,
        "given_name": "Tester",
        "family_name": "Prophet",
        "email": "tester@prophetdigits.com"
    }
}]
    Parameter Type Description
    id integer The company id
    name string The company name
    cover_image object The company’s cover image. If no set cover image, return empty
    owner object The founder information of company
    cover_image Type Description
    name string The filename without extension
    cover boolean The tag that decide image is cover or not
    • true: cover image
    • false: normal image
    resource ojbect The urls of each resolution
    cover_image.resource Type Description
    240p string The picture url of 240 resolution (426x240)
    480p string The picture url of 480 resolution (854x480)
    720p string The picture url of 720 resolution (1280x720)
    1080p string The picture url of 1080 resolution (1920x1080)
    owner Type Description
    id integer The user id
    given_name string The given name
    family_name string The family name
    email string The email

    Return Failure Parameters

    Failure 
    {
    "error_name":"lack of parameters"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • lack of parameters: required parameters miss in the request
    • does not signin: the user does not signin
    • empty text: the search text cannot be empty

    • false: not current company

    Create Company

    Description

    Title Description
    URL user/company/create
    Method post
    Use To create company
    Notice

    Input Parameters

    Input Parameters

    {
    "api_key": "e4cbcdc2faff41a7e311",
    "short_number": "AAAA",
    "name": "Test Bike",
    "website": "",
    "description": "description",
    "street": " street",
    "city": "city",
    "state": "",
    "postal_code": "777",
    "system_country_id": 228,
    "contact_given_name":  "Tester",
    "contact_family_name":  "Prophet",
    "contact_job_title":  "coder",
    "contact_phone":  "0987654321",
    "contact_email":  "tester@prophetdigits.com",
    "images":[{
        "name": "xxx.jpg",
        "cover": true
    }, {
        "name": "xxx.jpg",
        "cover": false
    }]
}
    Parameter Type Description
    api_key string The identity token of user
    short_number string The short number of company, four letters and uppercase
    name string The company name
    website string The company website link
    description string The company description
    street string The street of company
    city string The city of company
    state string The state of company
    postal_code string The postal code of company
    system_country_id integer The country id of system
    contact_given_name string The given name of contacts
    contact_family_name string The family name of contacts
    contact_job_title string The job title of contacts
    contact_phone string The phone number of contacts
    contact_email string The email of contacts
    images array (option) Collection of company image
    image Type Description
    name string The temporary filename which takes from uploded image api
    cover boolean The tag that decide image is cover or not
    • true: cover image
    • false: normal image

    Return Success Parameters

    Return Parameters

    Success 
    {
    "id": 1
}
    Parameter Type Description
    id integer The company id

    Return Failure Parameters

    Failure 
    {
    "error_name": "illegal form input",
    "validation": {
        "name": ["duplicate"],
        "country": ["invalid country"]
    }
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • lack of parameters: required parameters miss in the request
    • does not signin: the user does not signin
    • illegal_form_input: the input does not pass validation
    validation object (option) If the error_name is ‘illegal form input’, system will show reasons for each error input
    validation Type Description
    short_number array (option) required:
    1. The short_number cannot be empty or null
    duplicate:
    1. The short_number has already been taken
    invalid value:
    1. The short_number not be allow to use
    name array (option) required:
    1. The name cannot be empty or null
    duplicate:
    1. The name has already been taken
    description array (optoin) required:
    1. The name cannot be empty or null
    street array (optoin) required:
    1. The street cannot be empty or null
    city array (optoin) required:
    1. The city cannot be empty or null
    postal_code array (optoin) required:
    1. The postal_code cannot be empty or null
    country array (optoin) invalid country:
    1. The country has not been exist
    contact_given_name array (optoin) required:
    1. The contact_given_name cannot be empty or null
    contact_family_name array (optoin) required:
    1. The contact_family_name cannot be empty or null
    contact_job_title array (optoin) required:
    1. The contact_job_title cannot be empty or null
    contact_phone array (optoin) required:
    1. The contact_phone cannot be empty or null
    contact_email array (optoin) required:
    1. The contact_email cannot be empty or null

    Company Detail Without Signin

    Description

    Title Description
    URL company/{company_id}/detail
    Method get
    Use To get the company detail
    Notice

    Url Parameters

    Parameter Type Description
    company_id integer The company id

    Return Success Parameters

    Return Parameters

    Success 
    {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Test Bike",
    "default_currency": "USD",
    "currencies": [{
        "id": 3,
        "name": "USD",
        "default": true,
        "exchange_rate": 1.137,
        "display_precision_point": 2
    }, {
        "id": 4,
        "name": "TWD",
        "default": false,
        "exchange_rate": 36,
        "display_precision_point": 0
    }],
    "images":[{
        "name": "xxx.jpg",
        "cover": true,
        "resource": {
            "px240": "http://abc/xxx_240p.jpg",
            "px480": "http://abc/xxx_480p.jpg",
            "px720": "http://abc/xxx_720p.jpg",
            "px1080": "http://abc/xxx_1080p.jpg"
        }
    }, {
        "name": "yyy.jpg",
        "cover": false,
        "resource": {
            "px240": "http://abc/yyy_240p.jpg",
            "px480": "http://abc/yyy_480p.jpg",
            "px720": "http://abc/yyy_720p.jpg",
            "px1080": "http://abc/yyy_1080p.jpg"
        }
    }]
}
    Parameter Type Description
    id integer The company id
    name string The company name
    default_currency string The default currency name
    currencies array Collection of company currency
    images array Collection of company image
    currency Type Description
    id number The currency id of system
    name string The currency name
    default boolean The tag that is it default currency for company
    exchange_rate number The exchange rate of currency in the company
    display_precision_point integer The minimize denominations of currency.
    ex.: If the value is 2, than the price should not show third decimal place
    image Type Description
    name string The filename
    cover boolean The tag that decide image is cover or not
    • true: cover image
    • false: normal image
    resource ojbect The urls of each resolution
    company.cover_image.resource Type Description
    px240 string The picture url of 240 resolution (426x240)
    px480 string The picture url of 480 resolution (854x480)
    px720 string The picture url of 720 resolution (1280x720)
    px1080 string The picture url of 1080 resolution (1920x1080)

    Return Failure Parameters

    Failure 
    {
    "error_name": "company not exist"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • company not exist: the company not exist

    }
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • lack of parameters: required parameters miss in the request
    • does not signin: the user does not signin
    • company not exist: the company not exist
    • not company member: user is not member in this company
    • no permission: the permission deny
    • illegal form input: the input does not pass validation
    validation object (option) If the error_name is 'illegal form input’, system will show reasons for each error input
    validation Type Description
    name array (option) required:
    1. The name cannot be empty or null
    duplicate:
    1. The name has already been taken
    description array (optoin) required:
    1. The name cannot be empty or null
    street array (optoin) required:
    1. The street cannot be empty or null
    city array (optoin) required:
    1. The city cannot be empty or null
    postal_code array (optoin) required:
    1. The postal_code cannot be empty or null
    country array (optoin) invalid country:
    1. The country has not been exist
    contact_given_name array (optoin) required:
    1. The contact_given_name cannot be empty or null
    contact_family_name array (optoin) required:
    1. The contact_family_name cannot be empty or null
    contact_job_title array (optoin) required:
    1. The contact_job_title cannot be empty or null
    contact_phone array (optoin) required:
    1. The contact_phone cannot be empty or null
    contact_email array (optoin) required:
    1. The contact_email cannot be empty or null

                "px1080": "http://abc/yyy_1080p.jpg"
            }
        }],
        "currency": "EUR",
        "price": 10
    }],
    "pager": {
        "total": 31,
        "per_page": 2,
        "current_page": 1,
        "last_page": 16
    }
}
    Parameter Type Description
    id integer The category id
    name string The category name
    items array Collection of item
    pager object The pagination information of item
    item Type Description
    id integer The item id
    name string The item name
    cover_image object The cover image. It will be empty if no set cover image
    images array Collection of item image
    currency string The default currency of item
    price number The item price
    item.cover_image Type Description
    px240 string The picture url of 240 resolution (426x240)
    px480 string The picture url of 480 resolution (854x480)
    px720 string The picture url of 720 resolution (1280x720)
    px1080 string The picture url of 1080 resolution (1920x1080)
    item.image Type Description
    name string The filename
    cover boolean The tag that decide image is cover or not
    • true: cover image
    • false: normal image
    resource ojbect The urls of each resolution
    item.image.resource Type Description
    px240 string The picture url of 240 resolution (426x240)
    px480 string The picture url of 480 resolution (854x480)
    px720 string The picture url of 720 resolution (1280x720)
    px1080 string The picture url of 1080 resolution (1920x1080)
    pager Type Description
    total integer Total number of item
    per_page integer Items per page for input
    current_page integer Current page number
    last_page integer Last page number

    Return Failure Parameters

    Failure 
    {
    "error_name":"lack of parameters"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • lack of parameters: required parameters miss in the request
    • category not exist: the category id is incorrect

    Failure 
    {
    "error_name": "illegal_form_input",
    "validation": {
        "name": ["invalid"],
        "parent_id": ["required"]
    }
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • not_sign_in: the api_key is invalid
    • not_select_company: the user has not select current company
    • illegal_form_input: The form format does not pass validation
    validation object (option) If the error_name is ‘illegal_form_input’, system will show reasons for each error input
    validation Type Description
    name array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    2. The data is empty
    invalid:
    1. The data is not string
    description array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not string
    parent_id array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not integer
    2. The category is not exist
    3. The category is not belongs to the current company
    specs array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not integer
    2. The spec is not exist
    3. The spec is not belongs to the current company
    customizations array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not integer
    2. The customization is not exist
    3. The customization is not belongs to the current company
    spec2s array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not integer
    2. The spec2 is not exist
    3. The spec is not belongs to the current company

    item_warranty Type Description
    type string The warranty type
    value integer The duration of warranty
    unit string The unit of duration

    Return Failure Parameters

    Failure 
    {
    "error_name": "lack of parameters"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • lack of parameters: some input parameters missing, not in the request
    • does not signin: The api_key is invalid
    • company not exist: target company not exist
    • not select company yet: user has not select current company
    • not company member: the user is not the company member
    • item not exist: item id is incorrect or item not belongs to target company

    Create Item

    Description

    Title Description
    URL user/company/item/create
    Method post
    Use To create item
    Notice

    Input Parameters

    Input Parameters

    {
    "api_key": "e4cbcdc2faff41a7e311",
    "name": "item name",
    "number": "item number",
    "categories": [1, 2, 3],
    "price": 123.456,
    "discount": 30,
    "deposit_ratio": 50,
    "ean": "",
    "unit": "",
    "contain": "",
    "weblink": "",
    "description": "",
    "images": [{
        "name": "asdasdasd.jpg",
        "cover": true
    }, {
        "name": "qweqweq.jpg",
        "cover": false
    }],
    "videos": [{
        "weblink": "http://asdas.youtube.com",
        "description": ""
    }, {
        "weblink": "http://asda.youtube.com",
        "description": ""
    }],
    "specs": [{
        "id": 1,
        "value": 2
    }],
    "spec2s": [{
        "id": 1,
        "configurable_values": [{
            "id": 1
        }, {
            "id": 2
        }]
    }],
    "warranty": {
        "type": "Limited",
        "value": 2,
        "unit": "Years"
    }
}
    Parameter Type Description
    api_key string The key will be returned by Sign In API
    name string The name of item
    number string The number of item
    categories array Collection of category id
    price number The price of item
    discount integer The max discount precent of item
    deposit_ratio integer The deposit ratio of item
    ean string The European Article Number
    unit string The unit of amount
    contain string The amount contained in this item
    weblink string The outside website of item
    description string The description of item
    images array Collection of item image
    videos array Collection of item video
    specs array Collection of spec
    spec2s array Collection of spec2
    warranty object The warranty configuration of item
    image Type Description
    name string The name will be returned by Upload Image API
    cover boolean The tag that decide image is cover or not
    • true: cover image
    • false: normal image
    video Type Description
    weblink string The url of vedio
    description string The description of vedio
    spec Type Description
    id integer The id of spec
    value integer The id of spec value
    spec2 Type Description
    id integer The id of spec2
    configurable_values array Collection of configurable_value
    spec2.configurable_value Type Description
    id integer The id of spec2 value
    warranty Type Description
    type string The warranty type - Limited or Lifetime
    The parameter of value and unit is unnecessary when type is Lifetime
    value positive integer (option) The duration of warranty
    unit string (option) The unit of duration - Years or Months

    Return Parameters

    Success

    The result is the same as Item Detail API

    Return Failure Parameters

    Failure 
    {
    "error_name": "illegal_form_input",
    "validation": {
        "name": ["required"],
        "number": ["required"]
    }
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • not_sign_in: the api_key is invalid
    • not_select_company: the user has not select current company
    • illegal_form_input: The form format does not pass validation
    validation object (option) If the error_name is ‘illegal_form_input’, system will show reasons for each error input
    validation
    name array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    2. The data should not be empty
    number array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    2. The data should not be empty
    categories array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not array
    2. The id of category is not exist
    3. The category is not belongs to the current company
    price array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not number
    discount array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not integer
    2. The data need between 0 to 100
    deposit_ratio array (option) invalid value:
    1. The data is not integer
    2. The data need between 0 to 100
    ean array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    unit array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    contain array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    weblink array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    description array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    images array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not array
    videos array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not array
    videos.(index).weblink array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    2. The data should not be empty
    videos.(index).description array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    specs array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not array
    spec2s array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not array
    spec2s.(index).id array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not integer
    2. The id is not belongs to categories
    spec2s.(index).id.configurable_values array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not array
    spec2s.(index).id.configurable_values.(index).id array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not integer
    2. The id is not belongs to the spec
    warranty array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    warranty.type array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. Either the data should be Limited or Lifetime
    warranty.value array (option) required:
    1. The field is required if type of warranty is Limited
    invalid:
    1. The data is not positive integer
    warranty.unit array (option) required:
    1. The field is required if type of warranty is Limited
    invalid:
    1. Either the data should be Years or Months

    "target_company_id": 1
}
    Parameter Type Description

    target_company_id integer company id which user want get spec list

    Return Parameters

    Return Parameters

    Success 
    {
    "specs": [{
        "id": 1,
        "name": "spec name",
        "display_name": "spec 1"

        "name": "spec name2",
        "display_name": "spec 1"
    }]
}
    Parameter Type Description

    name string spec name
    display_name string spec display name
    Failure 
    {
    "error_name":"lack of parameters"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name String if the value of success is false, web backend needs to assign the name of error, unless this parameter should be empty: Valid Value:
    lack of parameters: some input parameters missing, not in the request
    does not signin: user does not signin
    not select company yet: user need change current company
    company not exist: currenct company not exist
    not company member: the user is not the company member

    "values": [{
        "name": "red"
    }, {
        "name": "blue"
    }]
}

    api_key string Web backend gives user a unique token after user login in app, then user should use this token to request data from web backend.
    name string spec name
    display_name string spec display name
    description string spec description
    categories array category id set
    values array spec value set
    name string value name

    Return Parameters

    Return Parameters

    Success 
    {
}
    Parameter Type Description
    (Nothing return) - -
    Failure 
    {
    "validation": {
        "name": ["dulicate"],
        "display_name": ["required"],
        "categories": ["not exist"]
    },
    "error_name": "illegal form input"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name String if the value of success is false, web backend needs to assign the name of error, unless this parameter should be empty: Valid Value:
    lack of parameters: some input parameters missing, not in the request
    does not signin: user does not signin
    not select company yet: user need change current company
    company not exist: currenct company not exist
    not company member: the user is not the company member

    validation object if the err_name is illegal form input’, web backend should assign the name of the wrong type for each error input. Value(option):
    name array required: it’s necessary parameter
    dulicate: the name has already been taken
    display_name array required: it’s necessary parameter
    categories array not exist: incorrent category id in the category set

    price number extra price(default currency) if select this customization value
    Failure 
    {
    "error_name":"lack of parameters"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name String if the value of success is false, web backend needs to assign the name of error, unless this parameter should be empty: Valid Value:
    lack of parameters: some input parameters missing, not in the request
    does not signin: user does not signin
    not select company yet: user need change current company
    company not exist: currenct company not exist
    not company member: the user is not the company member

    name array required: it’s necessary parameter
    dulicate: the name has already been taken
    display_name array required: it’s necessary parameter
    categories array not exist: incorrent category id in the category set
    root category: cannot connect root category

    id integer customization’s id
    value integer id of customization value
    images array variant images
    name string file name which get from back end after specific image has been updated

}

    validation object if the err_name is illegal form input’, web backend should assign the name of the wrong type for each error input. Value(option):
    name array required: it’s necessary column for this api
    customizations array required: it’s necessary parameter
    duplicate: this customization setting has been used

    Edit Product

    Description

    Title Description
    URL user/company/item/product/edit
    Method post
    Use edit product information
    Notice

    Input Parameters

    Input Parameters

    {
    "api_key": "e4cbcdc2faff41a7e311",
    "product_num": "1A01B021440012345",
    "serial_number": "1A01B021440012345",
    "prices": [
        {
          "company_currency_id": 227,
          "product_price": 1000
        },
        {
          "company_currency_id": 228,
          "product_price": 33602
        }
    ],
    "added_files": [{
        "name": "proforma.jpg",
        "date": 1498730137,
        "comment": "proforma invoice",
        "resource": ""
    }],
    "deleted_files": [1, 2, 3],
    "warranty": {
        "type": "Limited",
        "value": 2,
        "unit": "Years"
    }
}
    Parameter Type Description
    api_key string Web backend gives user a unique token after user login in app, then user should use this token to request data from web backend.
    product_number string product’s number
    serial_number string (option) product serial number
    prices array (option) product prices
    company_currency_id integer company currency id
    product_price integer product price
    added_files array (option) uploaded files
    name string file name
    date timestamp uploaded date
    comment string file comment
    resource string uploaded data which is encrypted by base64, exclude mime type
    deleted_files array (option) a set of file id
    warranty object warranty setting of item
    type string warranty type - Limited or Lifetime
    value positive integer (option) warranty value
    unit string (option) value unit - Years or Months
    start_date timestamp (option) start date of limited warranty for sold product
    end_date timestamp (option) end date of limited warranty for sold product

    Return Parameters

    Return Parameters

    Success 
    {
}
    Parameter Type Description
    (Nothing return) - -
    Failure 
    {
    "error_name":"lack of parameters"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string the name of the wrong type.
    lack of parameters: the request does not include the necessary parameters
    does not signin: user does not signin
    not select company yet: user need change current company
    company not exist: currenct company not exist
    not company member: the user is not the company member
    permission deny: not product owner or shipment importer
    product sold: product is sold
    added_files array (option) invalid format: required parameter not exist
    invlid date format: date not timestamp
    deleted_files array (option) invalid files: file id not found

    "spec": {
        "id": 1,

        "comment": "",

        "categories": [{

        }],
        "compositions": [{

        }],
        "values": [{
            "id": 1,
            "name": "small multiply",
            "display_name": "Small Multiply",
            "price": 10,
            "part_number": "",
            "supplier_number": "",
            "description": "",
            "comment": "",
            "sofe_delete": false,
            "compositions": [{
                "id": 2,
                "name": "color",
                "display_name": "color",
                "value": {
                    "id": 1,
                    "name": "red",
                    "display_name": "red"
                }
            }]
        }]
    }
}
    Parameter Type Description
    spec object The spec2 detail
    spec Type Description
    id integer The id of spec2
    name string The name of spec2
    display_name string The display name of spec2
    comment string The comment of spec2
    part boolean The spec2 is part or not
    categories array Collection of category
    compositions array Collection of spec
    values array Collection of spec value
    spec.category Type Description
    id integer The id of category
    name string The name of category
    spec.composition Type Description
    id integer The id of spec2
    name string The name of spec2
    display_name string The display name of spec2
    part boolean The tag that is it part or not
    spec.value Type Description
    id integer The id of spec2 value
    name string The name of spec2 value
    display_name string The display name of spec2 value
    price number The price of value, the currency is default by company
    part_number string The part number of spec2 value
    supplier_number string The supplier number of spec2 value
    description string The description of spec2 value
    comment string The comment of spec2 value
    sofe_delete boolean The tag that is it deleted
    compositions array Collection of value composition
    spec.value.composition Type Description
    id integer The id of spec2
    name string The name of spec2
    display_name string The display name of spec2
    value object The setting of composition value
    spec.value.composition.value Type Description
    id integer The id of spec2 value
    name string The name of spec2 value
    display_name string The display name of spec2 value

    Return Failure Parameters

    Failure 
    {
    "error_name":"not_sign_in"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • not_sign_in: the api_key is invalid
    • not_select_company: the user has not select current company
    • spec_not_exist: the spec is not exist
    • no_option: the current company of user does not have option with company of spec

    Create Spec2

    Description

    Title Description
    URL user/company/spec2/create
    Method post
    Use To create spec
    Notice

    Input Parameters

    Input Parameters

    {
    "api_key": "e4cbcdc2faff41a7e311",
    "name": "Second hand",
    "display_name": "Second hand",
    "comment": "",
    "part": false,
    "categories": [1, 2, 3],
    "compositions": [2],
    "values": [{
        "name": "small multiply",
        "display_name": "Small Multiply",
        "price": 10,
        "part_number": "",
        "supplier_number": "",
        "description": "",
        "comment": "",
        "compositions": [{
            "id": 2,
            "value": 1
        }]
    }]
}
    Parameter Type Description
    api_key string The identity token of user
    name string The name of spec2
    display_name string The display name of spec2
    comment string The comment of spec2
    part boolean The spec2 is part or not
    Accepted input are true, false, 1, 0, “1”, and “0”
    categories array Collection of category id
    compositions array Collection of spec2 id
    values array Collection of value
    value Type Description
    name string The name of spec2 value
    display_name string The display name of spec2 value
    price number The price of value, the currency is default by company
    part_number string The part number of spec2 value
    supplier_number string The supplier number of spec2 value
    description string The description of spec2 value
    comment string The comment of spec2 value
    compositions array Collection of value composition
    value.composition Type Description
    id integer The spec2 id
    value integer The id of spec2 value for current composition
    It’s not set if value is 0

    Return Parameters

    Success

    The result is the same as Spec2 Detail API

    Return Failure Parameters

    Failure 
    {
    "error_name": "illegal_form_input",
    "validation": {
        "display_name": ["required"],
        "categories": ["invalid"]
    }
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • not_sign_in: the api_key is invalid
    • not_select_company: the user has not select current company
    • illegal_form_input: the form format does not pass validation
    validation object (option) If the error_name is ‘illegal_form_input’, system will show reasons for each error input
    validation Type Description
    name array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    2. The data is empty
    invalid:
    1. The data is not string
    display_name array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    2. The data is empty
    invalid:
    1. The data is not string
    comment array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not string
    part array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not boolean
    categories array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not array
    2. The category id is not exist
    3. The category is not belongs to the current company
    compositions array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not array
    2. The spec2 id is not exist
    3. The spec2 is not belongs to the current company
    values array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not array
    values.(index).name array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not string
    values.(index).display_name array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not string
    values.(index).price array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not number
    values.(index).part_number array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not string
    values.(index).supplier_number array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not string
    values.(index).description array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not string
    values.(index).comment array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not string
    values.(index).compositions array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not array
    2. The number of data is differ to compositions of spec
    values.(index).compositions.(index).id array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not integer
    2. The id not in compositions of spec2
    values.(index).compositions.(index).value array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not integer
    2. The value id of spec2 is not exist
    3. The spec2 value is not belongs to the spec2

    invalid:
    1. The data is not string
    values.(index).compositions array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not array
    2. The number of data is differ to compositions of spec2
    values.(index).compositions.(index).id array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not integer
    2. The id not in compositions of spec2
    values.(index).compositions.(index).value array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not integer
    2. The value id of spec2 is not exist
    3. The spec2 value is not belongs to the spec2

    Description

    Title Description
    URL company/item/variant2/list

    "item_id": 1,
    "spec_values": [1, 2]
}
    Parameter Type Description
    api_key string The identity token of user
    target_company_id integer The company id of item
    item_id integer The item id
    spec_values array (option) Collection of id of spec value. It’s to filter variants combine by those spec value

    Return Parameters

    Success

    "variants": [{
        "id": 1,

        "deposit": 20,
        "cover_image": {
            "px240": "http://abc/xxx_240p.jpg",
            "px480": "http://abc/xxx_480p.jpg",
            "px720": "http://abc/xxx_720p.jpg",
            "px1080": "http://abc/xxx_1080p.jpg"

        "duplicate_combination": true,
        "company": {
            "id": 1
        }
    }]
}

    variant Type Description

    number string The number of variant
    stock integer The product amount of variant
    currency string The default currency of company
    price numeric The price of variant for default currency
    deposit numeric The deposit of price for default currency
    cover_image object The url of each resolution for cover image
    duplicate_combination boolean The combination is duplicate with other variant2
    company object The company of variant
    variant.cover_image Type Description
    px240 string The picture url of 240 resolution (426x240)
    It’s empty string if no cover image
    px480 string The picture url of 480 resolution (854x480)
    It’s empty string if no cover image
    px720 string The picture url of 720 resolution (1280x720
    It’s empty string if no cover image
    px1080 string The picture url of 1080 resolution (1920x1080)
    It’s empty string if no cover image

    id integer The company id

    • not_select_company: The user has not select current company
    • item_not_exist: The item is not exist or not belongs to target company

    Create Variant2

    Description

    Title Description
    URL user/company/item/variant2/create
    Method post
    Use To create variant2
    Notice

    Input Parameters

    Input Parameters

    {
    "api_key": "e4cbcdc2faff41a7e311",
    "item_id": 1,
    "name": "Basic",
    "number": "autark-k1-ss-001",
    "weblink": "",
    "taric_code": "",
    "prices": [{
        "currency": "EUR",
        "value": 100
    }],
    "specs": [{
        "id": 1,
        "value": 2
    }, {
        "id": 3,
        "value": 10
    }],
    "images": [{
        "name": "asdasdasd.jpg",
        "cover": true
    }, {
        "name": "qweqweq.jpg",
        "cover": false
    }],
    "warranty": {
        "type": "Limited",
        "value": 2,
        "unit": "Years"
    }
}
    Parameter Type Description
    api_key string The identity token of user
    item_id integer The item id
    name string The variant2 name
    number string The variant2 number
    weblink string The website URL of variant2
    taric_code string The taric code of variant2
    specs array Collection of spec2 configuration
    prices array Collection of each currency price
    images array Collection of image
    warranty object The warranty configuration of variant2
    price Type Description
    currency string The currency name
    value numeric The currency’s price
    spec Type Description
    id integer The spec2 id
    value integer The id of spec2 value
    It’s zero indicate no setting
    image Type Description
    name string The temporary filename which takes from uploded image api
    cover boolean The tag that decide image is cover or not
    • true: cover image
    • false: normal image
    warranty Type Description
    type string The warranty type - Limited or Lifetime
    The parameter of value and unit is unnecessary when type is Lifetime
    value positive integer (option) The duration of warranty
    unit string (option) The unit of duration - Years or Months

    Return Parameters

    Success

    The result is the same as Variant2 Detail API

    Return Failure Parameters

    Failure 
    {
    "error_name": "illegal_form_input",

        "name": ["invalid"],
        "number": ["required"]
    }
}

    • not_sign_in: The api_key is invalid
    • not_select_company: The user has not select current company
    • item_not_exist: The item is not exist or not belongs to target company
    • illegal_form_input: The form format does not pass validation
    validation object (option) If the error_name is ‘illegal_form_input’, system will show reasons for each error input
    validation Type Description
    item_id array (option) required:

    1. The data should be integer
    name array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    2. The data should not be empty
    invalid:
    1. The data should be string
    number array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data should be string
    weblink array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data should be string
    taric_code array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data should be string
    prices array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data should be array
    prices.(index).currency array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The currency not set in company
    prices.(index).value array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data should be numeric
    specs array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data should be array
    spec2s.(index).id array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not integer
    2. The id is not belongs to item
    specs.(index).value array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not integer
    2. The id is not set in item
    images array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data should be array
    images.(index).name array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    2. The data should not be empty
    invalid:
    1. The data should be string
    images.(index).cover array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data should be boolean
    warranty array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    warranty.type array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. Either the data should be Limited or Lifetime
    warranty.value array (option) required:
    1. The field is required if type of warranty is Limited
    invalid:
    1. The data is not positive integer
    warranty.unit array (option) required:
    1. The field is required if type of warranty is Limited
    invalid:
    1. Either the data should be Years or Months

    Product2 List

    Change Log

    2020.01.14 / Jianhua

    • Modify Input Parameters:
      • deposit_owner: modify description
      • holder: modify description
      • location: modify description
    • Modify Input Example:
    • Modify Success Parameters
      • products: modify description

    Description

    Title Description
    URL user/company/item/product2/list
    Method post
    Use Show product2 list
    Notice

    Input Parameters

    Input Parameters

    {
    "api_key": "e4cbcdc2faff41a7e311",
    "target_company_id": 1,
    "item_id": 1,
    "variant_id": 1,
    "pagination": {
        "page": 2,
        "per_page": 50
    },
    "filter": {
        "sold": true
    }
}

    Input Parameters (For Brand - Local)

    {
    "api_key": "e4cbcdc2faff41a7e311",
    "target_company_id": 1,
    "item_id": 1,
    "variant_id": 1,
    "filter": {
        "location": 1
    }
}

    Input Parameters (For Brand - Remote)

    {
    "api_key": "e4cbcdc2faff41a7e311",
    "target_company_id": 1,
    "item_id": 1,
    "variant_id": 1,
    "filter": {
        "location": 0
    }
}

    Input Parameters (For Retailer - Local)

    {
    "api_key": "e4cbcdc2faff41a7e311",
    "target_company_id": 1,
    "item_id": 1,
    "variant_id": 1,
    "filter": {
        "holder": 2
    }
}

    Input Parameters (For Retailer - Remote)

    {
    "api_key": "e4cbcdc2faff41a7e311",
    "target_company_id": 1,
    "item_id": 1,
    "variant_id": 1,
    "filter": {
        "holder": 0
    }
}
    Parameter Type Description
    api_key string The identity token of user
    target_company_id integer The company id of variant2
    item_id integer The item id of variant2
    variant_id integer The variant2 id
    It’s 0 will return all product2 of item
    pagination object (option) The pagination setting
    It get all data if without pagination parameters
    filter object (option) The filter setting
    pagination Type Description
    page integer (option) The specific page in the pagination
    1. The default is 1
    2. The number is 1 when it less than 1
    3. The number is max page when it more than max page
    per_page integer (option) The quantity of per page
    The default is 50
    filter Type Description
    sold boolean (option)
    1. (unuse): The produdcts contain sold and unsold product
    2. true: Filter out unsold products
    3. false: Filter out sold products
    deposit_owner integer (option)
    1. (unuse): No filter
    2. 0: Filter out products which deposit owner is not current company
    3. company id: Filter out products which deposit owner is specific company
    holder integer (option)
    1. (unuse): No filter
    2. 0: Filter out products which thare are no location or last location is not checkin or last location checkin by other company or last location checkin by other user of current company
    3. other than 0: Filter out products which last location checkin by current user of current company
    location integer (option)
    1. (unuse): No filter
    2. 0:
      • Brand: Filter out products which last location checkin by other company or last location is not checkin
      • Not Brand: Filter out products which there are no location or last location checkin by other company or last location is not checkin
    3. other than 0:
      • Brand: Filter out products which there are no location or last location checkin by current company
      • Not Brand: Filter out products which last location checkin by current company

    Return Success Parameters

    Return Parameters

    Success 
    {
    "products": [{
        "number": "1A01B021440012345",
        "short_number": "",
        "serial_number":"",
        "qrcode": ".....",
        "sold": false,
        "printed_at": 1577635200,
        "variants": [],
        "last_holder": {
            "id": 1,
            "given_name": "CC",
            "family_name": "Lee",
            "operator": {
                "id": 1,
                "given_name": "CC",
                "family_name": "Lee",
                "company": {
                    "id": 1,
                    "name": "Bionicon"
                }
            }
        },
        "deposit_owner": {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "Bionicon"
        },
        "purchase_order_number": "AAAA010120160000PO",
        "shipment_number": "AAAA010120160000SH"
    }, {
        "number": "1A01B021440012345",
        "short_number": "",
        "serial_number":"",
        "qrcode": ".....",
        "sold": true,
        "printed_at": 1577635200,
        "variants": [{
            "id": 1,
            "name": "mutiply k1",
            "number": "mk1"
        }, {
            "id": 2,
            "name": "mutiply k2",
            "number": "mk2"
        }],
        "last_holder": {
            "id": 0,
            "given_name": "",
            "family_name": "",
            "operator": {
                "id": 1,
                "given_name": "CC",
                "family_name": "Lee",
                "company": {
                    "id": 1,
                    "name": "Bionicon"
                }
            }
        },
        "deposit_owner": {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "Bionicon"
        },
        "purchase_order_number": null,
        "shipment_number": null
    }],
    "pagination": {
        "total": 50,
        "per_page": 50,
        "current_page": 1,
        "last_page": 1
    }
}
    Parameter Type Description
    products array Collection of product2
    • Brand: My products
    • Not Brand: the products which last location checkin by current company or assigned to purchase order of current company
    pagination object (option) The page information
    The parameter will appear if you use pagination
    product Type Description
    number string The product2 number
    short_number string The short number of product2
    serial_number string The serial number of product2
    qrcode string The product2 qrcode encoded by base64
    sold boolean The status of product2
    1. true: sold
    2. false: unsold
    printed_at timestamp / null The last printed time, the product is not printed will show null
    last_holder object / null The last holder of product
    It’s null when product not checkin, checkout or sold
    deposit_owner object The company of paying deposit
    purchase_order_number string / null The purchase order number which product is assigned
    It’s null when product is not assigned to purchase order
    shipment_number string / null The shipment number which product is assigned
    It’s null when product is not assigned to shipment
    product.last_holder Type Description
    id integer The user id
    It’s 0 if product is check out or sold
    given_name string The given name of user
    It will be empty if product is check out or sold
    family_name string The family name of user
    It will be empty if product is check out or sold
    operator object The operator of check in or check out or sell
    product.last_holder.operator Type Description
    id integer The user id
    given_name string The given name of user
    family_name string The family name of user
    company object The company when user check in or check out product or sell it
    product.last_holder.operator.company Type Description
    id integer The company id
    name string The company name
    product.deposit_owner Type Description
    id integer The company id
    name string The company name
    pagination Type Description
    total integer The total quantity of product2
    per_page integer The quantity of per page
    current_page integer The current page
    last_page integer The last page

    Return Failure Parameters

    Failure 
    {
    "error_name":"variant_not_exist"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • not_sign_in: The api_key is invalid
    • not_select_company: The user has not select current company
    • item_not_exist: The item not exist or not belongs to target company
    • variant_not_exist: The variant not exist or not belongs to target company
    • target_company_not_exist: target company is not exist
    • no_option: The current company does not have option with target company

    • unassign_from_shipment

    • set_as_unsold_manually

    Edit Product2

    Description

    Title Description
    URL user/company/item/product2/edit
    Method post
    Use Edit product2
    Notice

    Input Parameters

    Input Parameters

    {
    "api_key": "e4cbcdc2faff41a7e311",
    "product_number": "1A01B021440012345",
    "serial_number": "1A01B021440012345",
    "prices": [{
          "currency": "EUR",
          "value": 1000
    }, {
          "currency": "TWD",
          "value": 33602
    }],
    "specs": [{
        "id": 1,
        "value": 2
    }],
    "added_files": [{
        "name": "proforma.jpg",
        "date": 1498730137,
        "comment": "proforma invoice",
        "resource": ""
    }],
    "deleted_files": [1, 2, 3],
    "warranty": {
        "type": "Limited",
        "value": 2,
        "unit": "Years",
        "start_date": 1498730137,
        "end_date": 1498730137
    }
}
    Parameter Type Description
    api_key string The identity token of user
    product_number string The product2 number
    serial_number string (option) The serial number of product2
    Only company member can edit
    prices array (option) Each currency’s price
    Only company member can edit
    specs array (option) Collection of spec2
    Only company member can edit
    added_files array (option) Collection of uploading files
    deleted_files array (option) Collection of file id
    warranty object (option) The warranty configuration of product
    Only company member can edit
    prices Type Description
    currency integer The currency name
    value integer The currency’s price
    specs Type Description
    id integer The spec2 id
    value integer The id of spec2 value
    added_files Type Description
    name string The filename
    date timestamp The uploading date
    comment string The comment
    resource string The file encrypted by base64, but exclude mime type
    warranty Type Description
    type string The warranty type - Limited or Lifetime
    The parameter is unnecessary when type is Lifetime
    value positive integer (option) The duration of warranty
    unit string (option) The unit of duration - Years or Months
    start_date timestamp (option) The start date of limited warranty for sold product
    end_date timestamp (option) The end date of limited warranty for sold product

    Return Parameters

    Success

    Nothing was returned

    Return Failure Parameters

    Failure 
    {
    "error_name": "not_sign_in",
    "validation": {
        "serial_number": ["invalid"],
        "prices.0.currency": ["required"]
    }
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • not_sign_in: The api_key is invalid
    • not_select_company: The user has not select current company
    • product_not_exist: The product not exist
    • no_option: The current company does not have option with company of product
    • illegal_form_input: The form format does not pass validation
    validation object (option) If the error_name is ‘illegal_form_input’, system will show reasons for each error input
    validation Type Description
    serial_number array (option) invalid:
    1. The data should be string
    prices array (option) invalid:
    1. The data should be array
    prices.(index).currency array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The currency not set in company
    prices.(index).value array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data should be numeric
    specs array (option) invalid:
    1. The data should be array
    specs.(index).id array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not integer
    2. The id is not belongs to item or product
    specs.(index).value array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. The data is not integer
    2. The value is not belongs to spec
    added_files array (option) invalid:
    1. The data should be array
    deleted_files array (option) invalid:
    1. The data should be array
    warranty.type array (option) required:
    1. The field is required
    invalid:
    1. Either the data should be Limited or Lifetime
    warranty.value array (option) required:
    1. The field is required if type of warranty is Limited and product not sold
    invalid:
    1. The data is not positive integer
    warranty.unit array (option) required:
    1. The field is required if type of warranty is Limited and product not sold
    invalid:
    1. Either the data should be Years or Months
    warranty.start_date array (option) required:
    1. The field is required if type of warranty is Limited and product is sold
    invalid:
    1. The data is not timestamp
    warranty.end_date array (option) required:
    1. The field is required if type of warranty is Limited and product is sold
    invalid:
    1. The data is not timestamp

      "name": "Company A"
    }
  }]
}
    Parameter Type Description
    inventories array The stock of variant and its location
    inventory Type Description
    id integer The variant id
    name string The variant name
    stock integer The stock in the location
    location object The location of inventory
    item object The item of variant
    location Type Description
    id integer The company id
    name string The company name
    street string The street of company
    city string The city of company
    state string The state of company
    postal_code string The postal_code of company
    country string The country of company
    latitude number The latitude of location
    longitude number The longitude of location
    item Type Description
    id integer The item id
    number string The item number
    name string The item name

    Return Failure Parameters

    Failure 
    {
  "error_name":"not_select_company"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • not_sign_in: The api_key is invalid
    • not_select_company: The user has not select current company

}
    Parameter Type Description
    api_key string The identity token of user
    cart_id integer cart’s id
    product_number string product2 number
    currency string Products will be paid by this currency. If the cart has never set currecy yet, you can assign currency to this cart. If the cart has set currency, you should always use this currency type to add products to this cart

    Return Parameters

    Success

    Nothing was returned

    Return Failure Parameters

    Failure 
    {
  "error_name":"lack of parameters"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • lack of parameters: required parameters miss in the request
    • does not signin: the user does not signin
    • not select company yet: user need change current company
    • company not exist: currenct company not exist
    • not company member: the user is not the company member
    • cart not exist: cart id is invalid
    • currency error: currency not same to cart’s currency
    • product in cart: product is added to cart
    • product not exist:
      1. product is not exist
      2. item of product is deleted
    • product sold: product is sold
    • sale region not found: VAT is not setted in company of product
    • importer region error: sales company is not importer in VAT country
    • no product permission: sales company has not option with product company
    • currency not exist: product company delete the currency

    Description

    Title Description
    URL user/company/order/create
    Method post
    Use To create order
    Notice

    Input Parameters

    Input Parameters

    {
  "api_key": "e4cbcdc2faff41a7e311",
  "cart_id": "C00001",
  "type": "credit_card"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    api_key string The identity token of user
    cart_id integer cart id
    type string payment method
    • cash
    • credit_card
    • PayPal
    • cash_consumer_app
    • credit_card_consumer_app

    Return Success Parameters

    Return Parameters

    Success 
    {
  "order_number":"AAAA160509000001OD",
  "payment_method": "PayPal",
  "qrcode": ""
}
    Parameter Type Description
    order_number string order number
    payment_method string payment method
    • cash
    • credit_card
    • PayPal
    • cash_consumer_app
    • credit_card_consumer_app
    qrcode string / null a base64 string of qr-code image.
    It’s null when payment method is credit_card or cash

    Return Failure Parameters

    Failure 
    {
    "error_name":"product invalid",
    "products": [
      "AAAA0000000001",
      "AAAB0000000001"
    ]
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • lack of parameters: required parameters miss in the request
    • does not signin: the user does not signin
    • not select company yet: user need change current company
    • company not exist: currenct company not exist
    • not company member: the user is not the company member
    • cart not exist: the cart id is invalid
    • repeat: order has be created by this cart
    • no products: there are no products in the cart
    • product invalid: some products which no option or item has been deleted or currency price has been deleted, but those still in the cart
    products array (option) Collection of product number.
    It’s show when error_name is product invalid
    order_number string (option) order number.
    It’s show when error_name is repeat
    payment_method string (option) payment method.
    It’s show when error_name is repeat
    • cash
    • credit_card
    • PayPal
    • cash_consumer_app
    • credit_card_consumer_app
    qrcode string / null (option) a base64 string of qr-code image.
    It’s null when payment method is credit_card or cash.
    It’s show when error_name is repeat

    "email": "a@gmail.com",
    "order_number": "AAAA0000000789OD"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    api_key string The identity token of user
    email string consumer email
    order_number string order number which consumer want to pay by PayPal buy no scanner

    Return Parameters

    Success

    Nothing was returned

    Return Failure Parameters

    Failure 
    {
    "error_name":"lack of parameters"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • lack of parameters: required parameters miss in the request
    • does not signin: the user does not signin
    • not select company yet: user need change current company
    • company not exist: currenct company not exist
    • not company member: the user is not the company member
    • order not exist:
      1. order number is invalid
      2. user is not salesperson
    • invalid email: email format is invalid
    • invalid payment: only order pay by paypal can use
    • confirming: order is confirming
    • paid: order has been paid
    • closed: order has been closed
    • refunded: order has been refunded

  }

    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • not_sign_in: The api_key is invalid
    • order_not_exist: order number is incorrect
    • order_is_finished: order is finished
    • order_is_aborted: order is aborted
    • order_is_timeout: order is timeout
    • order_not_bound_same_user: order has been bound with another user

    validation object (option) If the error_name is ‘illegal_form_input’, system will show reasons for each error input
    validation Type Description
    billing_address.given_name array (option) required:
    1. The data is empty
    invalid:
    1. The data is not a string
    billing_address.family_name array (option) required:
    1. The data is empty
    invalid:
    1. The data is not a string
    billing_address.title array (option) invalid:
    1. The data is not true, false, 1, 0, “1”, and “0”
    billing_address.phone array (option) invalid:
    1. The data is not string
    billing_address.street array (option) invalid:
    1. The data is not string

    1. The data is not string

    1. The data is not string
    billing_address.state array (option) invalid:
    1. The data is not string
    billing_address.code array (option) invalid:
    1. The data is not string
    billing_address.country array (option) invalid:
    1. The data is not string

    • Confirmed

    • Partly Paid
    • Delayed
    • Unpaid
    • Ignored
    comment string status comment
    create_at timestamp

    Return Failure Parameters

    Failure 
    {
    "error_name":"lack of parameters"
}
    Parameter Type Description
    error_name string The failed reason which HTTP code is 403
    • lack of parameters: the request does not include the api_key or order_number parameter
    • does not signin: the api_key of user does not signin
    • not select company yet: the api_key of user need change current company
    • company not exist: the api_key of currenct company is not exist
    • not company member: the api_key of the user is not the company member
    • order not exist: the order_number is incorrect
